name: electron-ts-playground
description: Testing Area from integrating TS with Electron, using electron-packer for distribution

scripts.build:prod: echo If you have changed scripts and not compiled the tsc or scss, use build:dev && set isDev=false && electron-packager . UNNAMED --all --overwrite --icon=./icon/icon.ico --out=output --ignore=.gitignore --ignore=/src --asar --sourcedir=./dist
scripts.build:win: echo If you have changed scripts and not compiled the tsc or scss, use build:dev && set isDev=false && electron-packager . UNNAMED --platform=win32 --overwrite --icon=./icon/icon.ico --out=output --ignore=.gitignore --ignore=/src --asar --sourcedir=./dist
scripts.build:mac: echo If you have changed scripts and not compiled the tsc or scss, use build:dev && set isDev=false && electron-packager . UNNAMED --platform=darwin --overwrite --icon=./icon/icon.ico --out=output --ignore=.gitignore --ignore=/src --asar --sourcedir=./dist
scripts.build:linux: echo If you have changed scripts and not compiled the tsc or scss, use build:dev && set isDev=false && electron-packager . UNNAMED --platform=linux --overwrite --icon=./icon/icon.ico --out=output --ignore=.gitignore --ignore=/src --asar --sourcedir=./dist
scripts.test: echo Error: no test specified && exit 1
scripts.start: npm run build:dev && set isDev=true && electron ./dist/main.js

author: Samuel Hembrow
